TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MatrixTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D
Public NotInheritable Class MatrixTransform3D Inherits Transform3D
.class public auto ansi sealed MatrixTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D

Docs.summary: Creates a transformation specified by a , used to manipulate objects or coordinate systems in 3-D world space.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class to create custom transformations that are not provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> class.
You can combine <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> objects by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup> class.
## Examples [!code-csharp[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#matrixtransform3dview3dn1)] [!code-vb[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#matrixtransform3dview3dn1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object. For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets a matrix representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> property inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> class. The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> property enables you to convert any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> object into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> object. Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform> class is defined by using a Matrix3D, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Value%2A> properties always return the same value. The MatrixTransform3D class exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A> property to enable write access.
## Examples [!code-csharp[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#matrixtransform3dview3dn13)] [!code-vb[matrixtransform3dview#MatrixTransform3DView3DN13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MatrixTransform3DView/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#matrixtransform3dview3dn13)]
